name: Quake Champions
notes: * Currently, you need the latest available version of your graphic card drivers to play this game. * If you experience stuttering, check this guide.
content:
files:
- qcshadercache: https://github.com/Zeioth/zeioth-lutris/raw/master/game-installers/quake-champions/quake-champions-dxvk-cache-0.0.10.zip
game:
  appid: '611500'
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/../../shadercache/611500/DXVK_state_cache/
    file: qcshadercache
    format: zip
- input_menu:
    description: 'Select your DXVK HUD (optional):'
    id: HUD
    options:
    - '0': None
    - '1': FPS
    - frametimes,fps,memory: Frametimes
    preselect: None
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: $INPUT_HUD
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
